scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:contract:provider
scripts.test:contract:provider: sh -c 'PACT_PROVIDER_APP_VERSION=${PACT_PROVIDER_APP_VERSION:-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)} PACT_CONTRACT_BRANCH=${PACT_CONTRACT_BRANCH:-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)} vitest run --globals test/contracts'
